label: All Documents
query: site:{input} (ext:doc OR ext:docx OR ext:odt OR ext:pdf OR ext:rtf OR ext:txt)

label: All Spreadsheets
query: site:{input} (ext:xls OR ext:xlsx OR ext:csv OR ext:ods)

label: All Presentations
query: site:{input} (ext:ppt OR ext:pptx OR ext:odp)

label: Configuration Files
query: site:{input} (ext:conf OR ext:config OR ext:cfg OR ext:ini OR ext:env)

label: Database Files
query: site:{input} (ext:sql OR ext:db OR ext:sqlite OR ext:mdb OR ext:accdb)

label: Backup Archives
query: site:{input} (ext:bak OR ext:backup OR ext:old OR ext:save OR ext:~)

label: Compressed Archives
query: site:{input} (ext:zip OR ext:rar OR ext:tar OR ext:gz OR ext:7z OR ext:bz2)

label: Log Files
query: site:{input} (ext:log OR ext:logs OR ext:out)

label: Code - Web
query: site:{input} (ext:php OR ext:asp OR ext:aspx OR ext:jsp OR ext:js OR ext:html)

label: Code - Backend
query: site:{input} (ext:py OR ext:java OR ext:rb OR ext:go OR ext:cs OR ext:cpp)

label: Data Formats
query: site:{input} (ext:json OR ext:xml OR ext:yaml OR ext:yml OR ext:toml)

label: Shell Scripts
query: site:{input} (ext:sh OR ext:bash OR ext:bat OR ext:cmd OR ext:ps1)

label: Key Files
query: site:{input} (ext:pem OR ext:key OR ext:crt OR ext:cer OR ext:p12 OR ext:pfx)

label: Source Control
query: site:{input} (ext:git OR inurl:.git OR inurl:.svn OR ext:gitignore)

label: Credentials Files
query: site:{input} (filename:credentials OR filename:password OR filename:passwords)

label: Sensitive Docs
query: site:{input} ext:pdf (confidential OR internal OR private OR secret)

label: Financial Docs
query: site:{input} (ext:xls OR ext:xlsx) (invoice OR payment OR salary OR budget)

label: Email Archives
query: site:{input} (ext:pst OR ext:ost OR ext:mbox OR ext:eml OR ext:msg)

label: Docker Files
query: site:{input} (filename:dockerfile OR filename:docker-compose)

label: CI/CD Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:.gitlab-ci OR filename:.travis.yml OR filename:jenkinsfile)

label: Package Managers
query: site:{input} (filename:package.json OR filename:composer.json OR filename:requirements.txt OR filename:gemfile)

label: SSH Config
query: site:{input} (filename:id_rsa OR filename:id_dsa OR filename:authorized_keys OR filename:known_hosts)

label: AWS Config
query: site:{input} (filename:credentials OR filename:config) (aws OR amazon)

label: API Specs
query: site:{input} (filename:swagger OR filename:openapi OR ext:wadl OR ext:wsdl)

label: Temp Files
query: site:{input} (ext:tmp OR ext:temp OR ext:swp OR ext:cache)

label: Memory Dumps
query: site:{input} (ext:dmp OR ext:dump OR ext:core)

label: Password Lists
query: site:{input} ext:txt (password OR passwords OR passwd) (list OR dump)

label: Kubernetes Configs
query: site:{input} (ext:yaml OR ext:yml) (kubernetes OR k8s OR kubectl)

label: Terraform Files
query: site:{input} (ext:tf OR ext:tfvars OR ext:tfstate)

label: Ansible Playbooks
query: site:{input} (ext:yaml OR ext:yml) (ansible OR playbook)

label: VPN Configs
query: site:{input} (ext:ovpn OR ext:conf) (vpn OR openvpn)

label: Database Dumps
query: site:{input} ext:sql (dump OR backup) (database OR db)

label: PHPInfo Files
query: site:{input} ext:php (phpinfo OR php_info)

label: Env Files
query: site:{input} (filename:.env OR filename:.env.local OR filename:.env.production)

label: Htaccess Files
query: site:{input} (filename:.htaccess OR filename:.htpasswd)

label: Nginx Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:nginx.conf OR ext:conf) nginx

label: PHP Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:php.ini OR filename:php.conf)

label: Web Shells
query: site:{input} (ext:php OR ext:asp) (shell OR cmd OR c99 OR r57 OR webshell)

label: Source Maps
query: site:{input} ext:map (sourceMappingURL OR sourceMap)

label: GraphQL Schemas
query: site:{input} (ext:graphql OR ext:gql OR filename:schema.graphql)

label: Redis Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:redis.conf OR filename:redis-cli)

label: MongoDB Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:mongod.conf OR filename:mongo.conf)

label: Private Keys
query: site:{input} (ext:key OR ext:pem) (private OR rsa OR dsa OR ecdsa)

label: JWT Secrets
query: site:{input} (jwt OR token) (secret OR key OR signing)

label: Postman Collections
query: site:{input} ext:json (postman OR collection) (api OR endpoint)

label: Insomnia Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:insomnia OR filename:workspace) ext:json

label: Core Dumps
query: site:{input} (ext:core OR filename:core.dump OR ext:mdmp)

label: Selenium Tests
query: site:{input} (ext:py OR ext:js) (selenium OR webdriver OR test)

label: Webpack Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:webpack.config OR filename:webpack.prod)

label: Procfiles
query: site:{input} (filename:Procfile OR filename:procfile)

label: Makefile Configs
query: site:{input} (filename:Makefile OR filename:makefile)
